channel.title: Wasteland
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wasteland" - Combines

item.title: Wasteland
item.content:encoded:
Do we have a list of failed combines? Or does anyone have a link to a list?

We have quite a few items listed in The Wiki, however it is hard to try out new combos without knowing what has failed.
Also, do we want to add the wasteland recipes to the potion guide? Or have its own separate guide (reductions are already there).
